message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and we're confident it will meet your needs perfectly. We're looking to maximize our earnings, so we're offering it to you for $110. Please let us know if this works for you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $110 is still a bit higher than my target price. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We understand your position and would like to make a proposal that benefits both of us. We are willing to sell the product for $107. This price allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while still being competitive in the market. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations.
